original	original_phase2	gsed	gsed2	sequential	instrument	seq_phase1	seq_phase2	gsed_label	label
Ma_SF_C01	Ma_SF_C04	gsdlac001	gpalac001	C01	SF	1	4	Does your child cry when he/she is hungry, wet, tired, or wants to be held?	Does your child cry when he/she is hungry, wet, tired, or wants to be held?
Ma_SF_C02	Ma_SF_C06	gsdcgc002	gpacgc002	C02	SF	2	6	Does your child look at and focus on objects in front of him/her?	Does your child look at and focus on objects in front of him/her?
